Class: AccessTokens

AccessTokens

There are two APIs in Chain Core: the client API and the network API. Each API is authenticated using access tokens with HTTP Basic Authentication.

More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/learn-more/authentication

new AccessTokens(client)

constructor - return AccessTokens object configured for specified Chain Core.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
client Client Configured Chain client object.

Methods

create(params [, callback])

Create a new access token.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Object Parameters for access token creation.
Properties
Name Type Description
id String User specified, unique identifier.
type String Either 'client' or 'network'.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created access token.
Type
Promise.<Object>

delete(id [, callback])

Delete the specified access token.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
id String Access token ID.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Status of deleted object
Type
Promise.<Object>

query(params [, callback])

Get a list of access tokens sorted by descending creation time, optionally filtered by type. Note: maximum list size is 1000 items
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Query Pagination information.
Properties
Name Type Argument Description
type String <optional>
 Type of access tokens to return.
callback pageCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Requested page of results.
Type
Promise.<Page>
